channel.title: CVE Feed for BlackBerry -- UEM Management Console
channel.description: The latest CVEs for BlackBerry -- UEM Management Console

item.title: CVE-2017-17442|2024-09-17T03:07:25.995Z -- blackberry -- uem%20management%20console
item.description: In BlackBerry UEM Management Console version 12.7.1 and earlier, a reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability that could allow an attacker to execute script commands in the context of the affected UEM Management Console account by crafting a malicious link and then persuading a user with legitimate access to the Management Console to click on the malicious link.
